feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: Matt Corallo, a Bitcoin developer, has announced that Wallet Encryption is now in a pull-able state. The announcement followed a lot of discussion with some positive results. He has requested final comments/ACKs on the development. Matt has also rebased onto wallet class and is ready for "wtf is this crap" messages, as per his Github post.
